title: Gavin Newsom 2024?
itunes:title: Gavin Newsom 2024?
description:
With midterms fast approaching and Charlie’s scary good history of predictions, he dives into backing up his educated guesses for the Democrat Party and their immediate and long-term strategies. There have been several big names thrown out regarding the Left’s nominee for 2024… Michele Obama, Hillary Clinton, and even Pete Buttigieg… but while Charlie’s guess might surprise you, he brings the receipts and plays the tape to prove his point. Have conservatives met their match in California's "failing up" governor? Democrats are working overtime to restructure the narrative before midterms as their voters tell pollsters they're over Biden.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
